Service Details: - Offers a unique farm experience featuring Kangaroos, Wallaroos, Bennet Walabys, Albino Walabys, Sugar Gliders, Pot-Bellied Pigs, Emus, Parrots, Peacocks, goats, fancy chickens, and Capybaras- Staff are on hand to answer any questions you might have about various species, habitat, breeding, diet, housing and general physiology
